mapper.sql: input_id, project_id, project_name, patient_set_id, patient_set_name, uid, patient_count, create_time, start_time, finish_time, status, remain_time, update_time ,progress ,crf_id
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
UPDATE p_input_task
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_set_id = #{patientSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_set_name = #{patientSetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_count = #{patientCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remain_time = #{remainTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER},
crf_id = #{crfId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where input_id = #{inputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select input_id from p_input_task where patient_set_id = #{patientSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status != 5
select count(*) from p_input_task where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status =3
select count(*) from p_input_task where uid=#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status =2
select sum(patient_count) from p_input_task where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status =3
select input_id from p_input_task where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status != 5
select count(*) from p_input_task where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (status =3 OR status = 2)
